abstract.t: This document defines some terms related to the Generic AAAarchitecture. The first section describes some broad aspects of suchan architecture. The second section looks at the various aspects andtypes of policy that come into play in an AAA architecture. Thethird section will describe some of the components of a singlepolicy. This work is preliminary and is expected to be complimentedby other work from the AAAARCH research group such as [POLICY MODEL]and [POLICY ACCOUNTING].
